skill.name: image-enhancer
skill.description: Improves the quality of images, especially screenshots, by enhancing resolution, sharpness, and clarity. Perfect for preparing images for presentations, documentation, or social media posts.
skill.summary: Improves the quality of images, especially screenshots, by enhancing resolution, sharpness, and clar...
skill.author: ComposioHQ

security_audit.summary: This skill consists solely of documentation (SKILL.md) with no executable code, scripts, or network operations. It describes image enhancement capabilities as a prompt template for AI assistance.

content.value_statement: Images and screenshots often appear blurry or low-quality when used across different platforms. This skill analyzes and improves image resolution, sharpness, and clarity to make visuals more professional.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes image quality including resolution, sharpness, and compression artifacts
Intelligently upscales images to higher resolutions
Enhances edges and details for improved sharpness
Optimizes images for specific use cases like web, print, or social media
Preserves original files while saving enhanced versions
limitations: Does not generate new image content - only enhances existing images
Cannot fix severely damaged or corrupted image files
Quality improvement depends on the input image quality
Does not perform inpainting or object removal

use_cases.title: Blog Post Images
use_cases.description: Enhance screenshots to make blog posts and articles look more professional

use_cases.title: Documentation Screenshots
use_cases.description: Improve UI screenshots for clearer documentation and README files

use_cases.title: Social Media Images
use_cases.description: Optimize and enhance images for Twitter, LinkedIn, and Instagram posts

prompt_templates.title: Batch Process
prompt_templates.prompt: Improve the quality of all [file type] files in this [directory/folder]

output_examples.input: Improve the image quality of screenshot-2024.png
output: ‚úì Sharpened edges and enhanced text clarity

best_practices: Always keep original files as backup before enhancement
Specify the output format (PNG for quality, JPG for smaller size)
Mention the target platform for optimal sizing on social media
anti_patterns: Don't expect this skill to generate new image content from scratch
Don't use on severely damaged images that may produce artifacts
Don't forget to specify desired resolution for best upscaling results

faq.question: What image formats are supported?
faq.answer: Common formats like PNG, JPG, JPEG, and other standard image types are supported.

faq.question: What is the maximum resolution for upscaling?
faq.answer: Upscaling depends on the source image quality. Higher quality inputs produce better enhanced results.

faq.question: Can this skill integrate with image editing tools?
faq.answer: This skill provides enhancement prompts. Actual processing depends on your AI tool's capabilities.

faq.question: Is my image data safe?
faq.answer: This is a prompt-based skill. Image processing depends on your AI tool's privacy and security measures.

faq.question: Why is my enhanced image still blurry?
faq.answer: Enhancement cannot create detail that doesn't exist. Very low-quality source images have limited improvement potential.

faq.question: How is this different from Photoshop or other tools?
faq.answer: This skill uses AI assistance for enhancement prompts rather than manual editing. It's faster for batch processing and prompt-driven workflows.
